item.title: Hunt These Dragons to Help #SlayDragonsSaveCats
item.description: Thousands of Dragons have already fallen as part of the #SlayDragonsSaveCats campaign, but there’s still work to be done! Check out all the ways you can slay Dragons in ESO and support the cause.
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: Earn New Rewards & Glory during the Undaunted Celebration
item.description: Who knows no fear of beast or blade? The Undaunted Celebration event is back! Clear dungeons to earn bonus rewards and Event Tickets. We are Undaunted!
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: Begin Your Adventure in Tamriel with 50% off The Elder Scrolls Online
item.description: Pick up The Elder Scrolls Online Standard Edition now at 50% off!
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: Twitch Drops Now Live for Consoles!
item.description: Twitch Drops are now available for Xbox One and PlayStation®4 users. Check out this article to learn about how you can set up your console ESO account and start earning rewards!
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: Explore Tamriel Free for a Limited Time in The Elder Scrolls Online
item.description: Experience The Elder Scrolls Online free during our next Free Play event!
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: Crown Store Showcase—November 2019
item.description: Sinister New Moon pets, dashing adventure wear, and Khajiiti-themed homes and furnishings make their way to the Crown Store during the month of November. Check them all out in this latest showcase!
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: Loremaster’s Archive—Dragons in the Second Era
item.description: The community has lore questions about Dragons during the time of The Elder Scrolls Online, and we have answers! Check out the latest Loremaster’s Archive, written by Loremaster Leamon Tuttle himself!
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: ESO’s Performance Improvements Plan
item.description: We’re working hard to make sure The Elder Scrolls Online runs as best as it possibly can. Read our plan for the game’s upcoming performance improvements from ESO’s Creative Director Rich Lambert and check back monthly for status updates.
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: ESO Community Guides—Dragonhold Special
item.description: Dragonhold and Update 24 are now live on PC/Mac, and that means we have a host of updated builds (one for every class!) and guides from the community for you to check out.
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online

item.title: The Spooky Season Is Here with the Return of the Witches Festival!
item.description: Boo! Battle Tamriel’s monsters, get double XP, and earn creepy new rewards during the Witches Festival in-game event! Learn everything you need to know about the frightening fete here.
item.dc:creator: The Elder Scrolls Online
